frontend_home_questionnaire.description: Tasks will be evaluated on code quality and visual aesthetics. Script should be built with only HTML, JS (vanilla or framework), and CSS.

tasks.description: Display the tasks in this JSON as a carousel. The script should allow flipping forward and back between tasks.
Build a script to display all existing countries as headings (the Country field) and under each country, display all the cities in that country (the City field).
Please go over the following design, and provide your insights regarding the interface (no more than 4-5 points).
